---
title: Group Members
listing:
    - id: grad-students
      contents: "grad-students/*.qmd"
      type: grid
      image-height: 225px
      grid-columns: 3
      sort: sortby
      fields: [image, title, started]
      field-display-names:
          started: "Started"
          position: "Position"
      grid-item-align: left

    - id: grad-students-coadvised
      contents: "grad-students-coadvised/*.qmd"
      type: grid
      image-height: 225px
      grid-columns: 3
      sort: sortby
      fields: [image, title, started, primary_advisor]
      field-display-names:
          started: "Started"
          position: "Position"
          primary_advisor: "Primary Advisor"
      grid-item-align: left

    - id: pi
      contents: "pi/*.qmd"
      type: grid
      image-height: 225px
      grid-columns: 3
      sort: sortby
      fields: [image, title]
      grid-item-align: left

    - id: alumni
      contents: "alumni/*.qmd"
      type: table
      sort: [ended desc, sortby]
      fields: [title, position, started, ended]
      sort-ui: [title, position, started, ended]
      filter-ui: [title, position, started, ended]
      field-display-names:
          title: "Name"
          position: "Role"
          started: "Started"
          ended: "Ended"

    - id: undergrads
      contents: "undergrad-students/*.qmd"
      type: grid
      image-height: 225px
      grid-columns: 3
      sort: sortby
      fields: [image, title, started]
      field-display-names:
          started: "Started"
          position: "Position"
      grid-item-align: left
---
